# <a name="change-font-or-font-size"></a><span data-ttu-id="14e68-102">Šrifto arba šrifto dydžio keitimas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-102">Change font or font size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="14e68-103">Skaitydami el. laiškus Outlook.com, galite naudoti naršyklės mastelio keitimo funkciją, kad padidintumėte arba sumažintumėte tekstą ekrane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-103">When reading email in Outlook.com, you can use your browser's zoom function to make the text on your screen larger or smaller.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="14e68-104">Norėdami keisti šriftą arba šrifto dydį kuriant pranešimą:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-104">To change the font or font size while composing a message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="14e68-105">Kūrimo srities apačioje pasirinkite **Šriftas**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-105">At the bottom of the compose pane, select the **Font**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="14e68-106">arba **Šrifto dydis**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-106">or **Font size**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="14e68-107">Piktogramos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-107">icons.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="14e68-108">Pasirinkite norimą naudoti šriftą arba šrifto dydį.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-108">Choose the font or font size you want to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="14e68-109">Jei kūrimo srities apačioje nematote formatavimo parinkčių meniu, pasirinkite **formatavimo parinktis**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-109">If you don't see the formatting options menu at the bottom of the compose pane, select the **Formatting options**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="14e68-110">Piktogramą.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-110">icon.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="14e68-111">Daugiau informacijos rasite [El. pašto dydžio ir išvaizdos keitimas Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/0b4eb323-23fc-4d5d-adbf-cae14c9c0386?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="14e68-111">For more information, see [Change font size and appearance of email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/0b4eb323-23fc-4d5d-adbf-cae14c9c0386?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
